name: Accident at Faux Pass
description:
CAR CONTROLS

  • W, A, S, D to move your car
  • SPACE to have your car drift!
  • R to reset your car's position if you get stuck.

CREDITS

Graphics Lead: Zenvin
Gameplay Lead: Fouman
Storywriting: Malibloo
Music: Lucas Z (Full Sountrack on Soundcloud)

A murder mystery unfolds before your eyes as you play a detective with one job. Investigating a car accident that might not have been an accident at all.

Drive around this low poly world and question every single person who might have nothing to do with any of this. Interact with a few things because this was made in a game jam and writing a lot of text takes a lot of time. Get to the final (implemented) plot twist and feel underwhelmed.
Who knows, if it's popular enough, we might actually finish the story in a second chapter!
